segments.text: Excuse me . Do you mind if I try this on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . The changing rooms are just this way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . It's a little tight . Do you have any in a larger size ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'll give you the next size up . That one is small , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Also , I'm not so sure about the color .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well.It doesn't go with your skirt . I think the color itself is fine though .
segments.speaker: S2
